docs.lead_paragraph: The great steel-and-glass structures of our hospitals, medical centers and research institutes--the new cathedrals of industrialized society--rear up on our urban skylines from Stockholm to Wichita, and in the developing world as well.

docs.lead_paragraph: A few weeks ago it seemed that nobody had anything good to say about the drug stocks.
